nodes.documentation:
@title Social Recovery Module - Allows to replace an owner without Safe confirmations if friends approve the replacement.
 @author Stefan George - <stefan@gnosis.pm>

devdoc.author: Stefan George - <stefan@gnosis.pm>

changeMasterCopy(address).details: Allows to upgrade the contract. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

confirmTransaction(bytes32).details: Allows a friend to confirm a Safe transaction.

getDataHash(bytes).details: Returns hash of data encoding owner replacement.

isConfirmedByRequiredFriends(bytes32).details: Returns if Safe transaction is a valid owner replacement transaction.

recoverAccess(address,address,address).details: Returns if Safe transaction is a valid owner replacement transaction.

params.prevOwner: Owner that pointed to the owner to be replaced in the linked list

recoverAccess(address,address,address).return: Returns if transaction can be executed.

setup(address[],uint256).details: Setup function sets initial storage of contract.

params._threshold: Required number of friends to confirm replacement.

devdoc.title: Social Recovery Module - Allows to replace an owner without Safe confirmations if friends approve the replacement.
